snippet.title: Quixzel Rush Christmas Helper
snippet.description:
Quixzel Rush Christmas Helper brings fun and excitement to casual arcade gamers. With simple controls and endless increasing difficulty, Quixzel Rush brings hours of entertainment to new and returning gamers. Crash through cookies, collect heals, and maximize the time you can survive in this high score arcade game. Casual arcade fun awaits with a Christmas themed atmosphere, join in the fun and play Quixzel Rush Christmas Helper!

How To Play:
The goal is to survive as long as you can. Collect points by running into objects. Objects show the health they will add or subtract above them. As time progresses the game will continue to become increasingly difficult.

Controls:
Move Left With A or Left Arrow Keys
Move Right With D or Right Arrow Keys
Open Menu With Escape Key

FEATURES:
Endless Increasing Difficulty
Casual Arcade Action
Easy Controls
Fun To Replay
Christmas Theme
